message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $12,000. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
Alice, your offer is a bit high for me. I'm interested in this product, but I'm only willing to pay $8,500. Let me know if you're open to that price.
Bob, I appreciate your offer.  However, I'm looking for a price closer to $11,000. This product is truly valuable and I'm confident you'd benefit greatly from it.
Alice, I understand your perspective, but $11,000 is still outside my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9,500.  This is my final offer. Let me know what you think.
